name: Velvet Soap Eco Pack Honey & Milk
description: Enjoy a combination of Velvet Milk & Almond and Honey & Yoghurt Soaps for nourished and moisturised skin. Velvet delivers soft and supple skin through its Hydrosoft Technology. Dermatologically tested  to be a non-irritant on skin.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
